subject: Broken Plus X pedal second use
description_text:
Hi,

I recently ordered the Plus X H2 pedals. The throttle pedal broke on the
second use. The black plastic piece shattered. Photos are attached. Please
assist ASAP

conversations.body_text: Hi Greg Helms,    Please provide your pedal order number, and we will send you a new accelerator pedal. Some of the goods in the previous batch at the US warehouse were assembled by temporary workers, who installed a part incorrectly, causing the components to collide with each other when the accelerator pedal was adjusted to a smaller travel distance. We apologize for the inconvenience and will arrange for a replacement as soon as possible.

Hi,

I attached the receipt and order form. Aliexpress order
number 8202475366393971.






On Thu, Aug 7, 2025, 9:40 PM service@simsonn.com

Hi Greg Helms,    This is not one of our authorized stores. It is best to purchase products from official stores, such as our official website, to ensure product quality and after-sales service. We will still resend your order. Please provide your address information.

Thanks.

2532 Iroquois Ave, Sanford, FL 32773.


On Thu, Aug 7, 2025, 11:26 PM service@simsonn.com
Hi Greg Helms，    We have shipped your order. Here is the tracking link:  https://t.17track.net/en#nums=SF6045846016758

Thank you for the update. I will share my experience of the excellent
service you have offered. Thank you again for assisting me.

On Fri, Aug 8, 2025, 5:48 AM service@simsonn.com
You're welcome. This is indeed a problem with our product, and we must take responsibility for it. We apologize for the inconvenience. Have fun!
